statements: DELETE FROM Route_Planning WHERE route_id = 10 AND traffic_conditions = 'High';
DELETE FROM Route_Planning WHERE starting_point = 'City A' AND charging_station_availability = 'Available';
DELETE FROM charging_stations WHERE location = 'Station A';
DELETE FROM route_planning WHERE start_location='New York' AND end_location='Los Angeles';
DELETE FROM charging_stations WHERE availability=true AND charge_speed>50;
DELETE FROM routes WHERE distance > 100 AND required_battery_charge < 50;
